title: The Billionaire's Lust
description: When Leila Montgomery signed the contract, she had no idea she'd fall head over heels in love with billionaire Jacob Whitmore--or betray his trust three times in a row.The fear of losing Jacob, of losing everything is making Leila do things that could very well lead to her worst nightmare: ending up alone.But while Jacob is hurt by her recent actions, he still sees the woman he loves and lusts for and will help her see it too...in and out of the bedroom.The Billionaire's Lust is part seven of the His Submissive series.
author: Ava Claire
